price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߞߎ߬ߡߊ߲߬ߘߌ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߛߌߟߊ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߵߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߟߎ߬ ߕߌߢߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
